thread.title: Dell Curry banks deep 3-pointer off dish from Steph - NBA.com
thread.title_full: Dell Curry banks deep 3-pointer off dish from Steph - NBA.com

author: Nba.Com Staff
title: Dell Curry banks deep 3-pointer off dish from Steph - NBA.com
text:
Dell Curry banks deep 3-pointer off dish from Steph 
NBA.com Staff Feb 1, 2017 11:40 PM ET 
Steph Curry's pregame warmup routine is impressive. Apparently, it runs in the family. 
Before the Hornets-Warriors game tonight at the Oracle, Steph Curry playfully tossed a ball in his father's direction. 
Dell Curry, the color commentator for Charlotte's television broadcasts, knew exactly what to do next. He took a couple quick dribbles and banked home a 3-pointer from well beyond the arc. Steph... to DELL... for THREE!! pic.twitter.com/1W9lroCF4O â€” CSN Warriors News (@CSNWarriors) February 2, 2017 
After hitting the shot (while wearing a suit), Dell Curry shouted "Your turn!" 
Here's another angle of the special father-son moment: It's been that kind of night for the Currys... pic.twitter.com/o2QkSaRaEy
